name: Shooting Waltz
description:
Summary

This game is a casual puzzle game that controls planes to move freely and shoot targets


Specific gameplay: The player controls the plane to move through the keyboard WASD or the small keyboard arrow keys, the plane will automatically launch bullets to attack the nearest monster, and you can pass the level after destroying a certain number of monsters.
After passing the level, the player's aircraft skill points will be rewarded, which can be used to improve the player's ability on the level page, and can increase the attack or the rate of fire.

After passing the level, you will also unlock the exquisite CG in the gallery!
